title: 1887 N172 Old Judge Silver Flint Batting Chicgo - PSA Altered
author: Golfcollector

posts.post_title: 1887 N172 Old Judge Silver Flint Batting Chicgo - PSA Altered
posts.post_content:
Taking offers on this one that I recently got back from PSA

I have provided a larger scan to show the card more clearly.  This one came back as Altered  appears to have some sort of chemical or liquid damage to the left side, so not sure if that is what caused the non-grade.

Still a tough card, PSA has only graded 2 of this particular and I am unsure on the SGC site as I cannot separate out by the various Silver Flint versions on their pop report.

Much like my other BST item for the CJ Leach, I will take offers on this one so please PM me if interested. 

[IMG]http://i626.photobucket.com/albums/tt347/Golfcollector/img669_zpstu9taknd.jpg[/IMG]
